title: Salami
content:
, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

A boon to any adventurer - delicious, long-lasting, and hard enough to smack an adversary.
